channel.title: Diane Larlus's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Diane Larlus's Personal Page

item.title: News
item.description: 2024 Invited for a keynote at the CoLLAs 2024 conference Invited as a lecturer for the International Computer Vision Summer School ICVSS 2024 Paper accepted at ICLR24: Weatherproofing Retrieval for Localization with Generative AI & Geometric Consistency [Paper, project page] Area Chair for CVPR24, ECCV24 2023 Invited speaker at the Self-Supervised Learning - Theory and Practice at NeurIPS23 Co-organizing the 3rd NAVER LABS Europe International Workshop on AI for Robotics EPIC Fields accepted at NeurIPS23 benchmark and dataset track [project page] Invited speaker at the workshop on Assistive Computer Vision and Robotics at ICCV23 Release of the EPIC Fields dataset and benchmark [project page] Paper accepted at CoLLAs23: RaSP: Relation-aware Semantic Prior for Weakly Supervised Incremental Segmentation [paper] 2 papers accepted at CVPR23 Fake it till you make it: learning transferable representations from synthetic ImageNet clones [project page] SLACK: Stable Learning of Augmentations with Cold-start and KL regularization [project page] Keynote speaker at two CVPR23 workshops, the Continual Learning in Computer vision and the Earth Vision ones Paper accepted at ICLR23: No Reason for No Supervision: Improved Generalization in Supervised Models [paper, project page] Doctoral Consortium chair for ICCV23 Area Chair for ICCV23 2022

item.title: Publications
item.description: ICLR24 - Weatherproofing Retrieval for Localization with Generative AI & Geometric Consistency Yannis Kalantidis, Mert Bülent Sarıyıldız, Rafael S. Rezende, Philippe Weinzaepfel, Diane Larlus, Gabriela Csurka └─ project page NeurIPS23 - EPIC Fields: Marrying 3D Geometry and Video Understanding Vadim Tschernezki, Ahmad Darkhalil, Zhifan Zhu, David Fouhey, Iro Laina, Diane Larlus, Dima Damen, Andrea Vedaldi └─ project page CoLLAs23 - RaSP: Relation-aware Semantic Prior for Weakly Supervised Incremental Segmentation Subhankar Roy, Riccardo Volpi, Gabriela Csurka, Diane Larlus └─ paper CVPR23 - Fake it till you make it: learning transferable representations from synthetic ImageNet clones Mert Bulent Sariyildiz, Karteek Alahari, Diane Larlus, Yannis Kalantidis └─ paper CVPR23 - SLACK: Stable Learning of Augmentations with Cold-start and KL regularization Juliette Marrie.

item.title: Recent talks
item.description: Dec 2023 Invited talk at the Self-Supervised Learning - Theory and Practice workshop at NeurIPS23 - Learning visual representations that transfers [Video] Oct 2023 Invited talk at the Assistive Computer Vision and Robotics workshop at ICCV23 - Towards Geometric Understanding in Egocentric Videos Jun 2023 Invited talk at the Continual Learning in Computer Vision workshop at CVPR23 - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] Jun 2023 Invited talk at the EarthVision workshop at CVPR23 - Lifelong visual representation learning Sep 2022 Invited talk at the Thoth team at Inria - Towards Semantic Understanding in Egocentric Videos Sep 2022 Invited talk at the Linkmedia Speaks Science seminar series - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] Jul 2022 Invited talk at the 1st International Workshop on Pervasive Artificial Intelligence - Lifelong visual representation learning Jul 2022 Keynote Speaker at CAp-RFIAP 2022 - Lifelong visual representation learning Jun 2022 Invited talk at the O-DRUM Workshop at CVPR22 - Using Text in Computer Vision Apr 2022 Invited talk at GDR TAL Day - Learning transferable visual representations Jan 2022 Invited talk at KUIS AI Meetings - Towards Semantic Understanding in Egocentric Videos Jun 2021 Invited talk at the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR21 - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] May 2021 Invited talk at the ANITI research institute (scientific seminar) - Learning from weak supervision and mitigating catastrophic forgetting Oct 2020 Keynote Speaker for MIAI Days - Lifelong visual representation learning Aug 2020 Invited talk at the ILR Workshop at ECCV20 - From Instance-Level to Semantic Image Retrieval [Video] Nov 2019 Invited talk at the SOLARIS Workshop - Self-supervised learning for category-level geometry estimation Apr 2019 Invited talk at the StatLearn 19 conference - Learning Image Representations for Efficient Visual Search Nov 2018 Invited speaker, AI and Vision session at SophIA Summit - Visual Search Jul 2018 Lecture at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school (PAISS) [slides] - Visual Search Older: see CV

item.title: Teaching

ENSIMAG, Grenoble [webpage] Dec 2023 Lifelong visual representation learning - Master AI 4 One Health, UGA, Grenoble Sep 2023 Keynote speaker at the VISMAC International Summer School on Machine Vision (VISMAC 2023) 2023 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - ENSIMAG, Grenoble 2020 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - Maison pour la Science Alpes-Dauphiné Nov 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2019/2020 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble Feb 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning in Practice’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2018/2019 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - item.title: News
item.description: 2021 Paper accepted at 3DV21: NeuralDiff: Segmenting 3D objects that move in egocentric videos [paper, project page, video] Co-organizing the ImageNet Past, Present, Future workshop at NeurIPS21 Paper accepted at ICCV21: Concept Greneralization in visual representations [project page, video, code] Co-organizing of the PAISS Summer School 2021 (organized by MIAI, PRAIRIE and NAVER LABS Europe) Invited talk at the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR21 [Video] Invited talk at the ANITI research institute (scientific seminar) 2 papers accepted at CVPR21 Probabilistic Embeddings for Cross-Modal Retrieval [paper, code] Continual Adaptation of Visual Representations via Domain Randomization and Meta-learning (oral) [paper, project page] 2 papers accepted at WACV21 Unsupervised meta-domain adaptation for fashion retrieval [paper, code, video] StacMR: Scene-Text Aware Cross-Modal Retrieval [paper, code, video] Area Chair for CVPR21, MVA21, ICCV21, BMVC21 2020
